title: Mouse stops game freezes
body:
Hey All
I am a mac user and since last week only i've been having some issues in the game , when i stop the mouse from moving the game freezes this has been uncomfortable for me since i cant land skill shots cause i need to keep moving my mouse in order for the game to not freeze, this issue happened since the last patch , but am not sure thats the cause , any help would be appreciated

replies.body:
This is an issue we've seen reports of for some mac players.  It turns out that there's a shake mouse to locate feature that may have been enabled.  Disabling it should fix this up!

* Launch System Preferences and select Dock
* Navigate to the Applications folder and select Accessibility - [screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/YsdJxd9.jpg) -
* Click on Display and un-check Shake mouse pointer to locate - [screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/PUrYDpv.jpg).) -

Let me know if that helps.

This doesn't work for me. I've unchecked that and it still hasn't resolved the issue. I noticed that this started happening after I updated to macOS 10.12.4. It happens during replays as well, not just actual games.

Sorry to hear!  In this case, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will take a closer look.  

Grab the logs provided by the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach it to your ticket so we can get more details.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!

I am also having the same problem, and this does not work for me either. I also noticed performance issues, meaning my game takes longer to load than usual. Usually I'm one of the first ones loaded in, but I noticed my % at 1 and 3% loading up.

If the issue persists after trying those steps, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will work with you individually to figure out why performance is dropping for your game.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to collect some logs, and attach it to your ticket  for more context.  We'll get back to you through your ticket!
